metadata.dc:description: Among eleven convalescent patients of Argentine hemorragic fever an electro-ballistocardiographic study was effected which led to the following conclusions: a) In 2 over 11 studied cases, electro-ballistocardiographic modifications of probable myocardial injury could be detected. b) The greatest percentage of the modifications was interpreted as normal variants of the electrocardiogram.
metadata.dc:title: Modificaciones electro-balistocardiograficas en la virosis hemorragica argentina.
[Ballistocardiographic changes in Argentinian hemorrhagic viral disease].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista de la Asociacion Medica Argentina
